caption:
“Truth is a fire that refines nations.”

Reflection:
Justice burns away deceit, leaving purity behind. Where truth blazes, darkness cannot dwell.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that truth is not gentle — it purifies through challenge. Transformation demands courage, both personal and collective.
